医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
即使在药物洗脱支架时代，双联抗血小板治疗仍应是 PCI 的标准策略经皮冠状动脉介入治疗（PCI）后使用药物洗脱支架进行普拉格雷单药治疗对于大出血并不优于双联抗血小板治疗（DAPT），但对于急性冠脉综合征（ACS）或高出血风险患者的心血管事件而言并不劣势。 HBR），根据今天在 ESC 2023 年大会热线会议上提出的最新突破性研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Dual-antiplatelet-therapy-should-remain-the-standard-strategy-for-PCI-even-in-the-drug-eluting-stent-era。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Dual-antiplatelet-therapy-should-remain-the-standard-strategy-for-PCI-even-in-the-drug-eluting-stent-era。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4137a79d-1482-48aa-9dc4-1419e0db2a8d Mon, 28 Aug 2023 10:01:37 -0400 Dual-antiplatelet therapy should remain the standard strategy for PCI even in the drug-eluting stent era
尽管青春期参与度下降，但身体活动习惯普遍持续最近的一项《科学报告》研究阐明了青春期期间根据青春期时间参与和停止体育活动的模式。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/General-persistence-of-physical-activity-habits-despite-decline-in-participation-during-adolescent.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/General-persistence-of-physical-activity-habits-despite-decline-in-participation-during-adolescent.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2674c8b7-e666-468a-b54c-975b1ce53b66 Mon, 28 Aug 2023 09:59:00 -0400 General persistence of physical activity habits despite decline in participation during adolescence
CRT-D 升级可降低采用 RV 起搏的 HFrEF 患者的发病率和死亡率与植入式心脏复律除颤器 (ICD) 相比，在特定的心力衰竭和射血分数降低 (HFrEF) 患者中，升级至除颤器心脏再同步治疗 (CRT-D) 可降低发病率和死亡率，并改善左心室 (LV) 逆重构根据今天在 ESC 2023 年大会上的热线会议上提出的最新突破性研究，间歇性或永久性右心室 (RV) 起搏。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/CRT-D-upgrade-reduces-morbidity-and-mortality-in-HFrEF-病人-with-RV-pacing.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/CRT-D-upgrade-reduces-morbidity-and-mortality-in-HFrEF-病人-with-RV-pacing.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e764a6a-0d52-464a-91ef-882e8a6f0fa8 Mon, 28 Aug 2023 09:54:19 -0400 CRT-D upgrade reduces morbidity and mortality in HFrEF patients with RV pacing
静脉注射羧基麦芽糖铁可降低缺铁患者心力衰竭住院的风险据研究，与安慰剂相比，在患有心力衰竭且左心室射血分数降低或轻度降低的缺铁患者中，静脉注射羧基麦芽糖铁 (FCM) 与 52 周内总心血管住院和心血管死亡综合结果的风险降低相关。今天在 2023 年 ESC 大会的热线会议上介绍了最新研究成果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Intravenous-ferric-carboxymaltose-linked-to-lower-risk-of-heart-failure-hospitalizations-in-iron-deficient-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Intravenous-ferric-carboxymaltose-linked-to-lower-risk-of-heart-failure-hospitalizations-in-iron-deficient-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c495c899-8d12-49c2-a3df-99293baae1a4 Mon, 28 Aug 2023 09:46:21 -0400 Intravenous ferric carboxymaltose linked to lower risk of heart failure hospitalizations in iron-deficient patients
PROFID EHRA 试验评估 ICD 治疗对心肌梗死幸存者的潜在益处对患有心力衰竭的心肌梗死幸存者常规植入植入式心脏复律除颤器（ICD）是否仍然是预防心源性猝死的充分疗法？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/PROFID-EHRA-tri-to-assess-the-pottial-benefit-of-ICD-therapy-in-myocardial-infarction-survivors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/PROFID-EHRA-tri-to-assess-the-pottial-benefit-of-ICD-therapy-in-myocardial-infarction-survivors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2b55ce82-17c0-44ed-a7d5-60cd5d63447c Mon, 28 Aug 2023 09:40:07 -0400 PROFID EHRA trial to assess the potential benefit of ICD therapy in myocardial infarction survivors
靶向线粒体相关程序性细胞死亡治疗年龄相关疾病的潜力该综述总结了线粒体在与年龄相关的疾病进展中的参与，并强调了其作为这些疾病的治疗靶点的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/The-pottial-of-targeting-mitochondria- Associated-programmed-cell-death-for-age-lated-disease-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/The-potential-of-targeting-mitochondria- Associated-programmed-cell-death-for-age-lated-disease-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7217948a-6082-4024-9668-a76f73c242cf Mon, 28 Aug 2023 09:30:00 -0400 The potential of targeting mitochondria-associated programmed cell death for age-related disease treatment
试验评估行为和心理干预措施以减少乳腺癌治疗的心脏毒性作用患有乳腺癌的女性将参加一项临床试验，检查行为和心理干预措施减少抗癌治疗对心脏损害的能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Trial-evaluates-behavioral-and-psychological-interventions-to-reduce-cardioknown-effects-of-breast-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Trial-evaluates-behavioral-and-psychological-interventions-to-reduce-cardioknown-effects-of-breast-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43a7c0a2-1b9a-4347-8b29-f9a30f68315c Mon, 28 Aug 2023 09:23:35 -0400 Trial evaluates behavioral and psychological interventions to reduce cardiotoxic effects of breast cancer treatment
研究显示中药治疗心力衰竭有益​今天在 ESC 2023 年大会热线会议上发布的最新突破性研究表明，中药七力强心可减少心力衰竭和射血分数降低 (HFrEF) 患者因心力衰竭住院和心血管死亡的情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Study-shows-benefit-of-traditional-Chinese-medicine-for-heart-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Study-shows-benefit-of-traditional-Chinese-medicine-for-heart-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c55d17d-4827-4690-b7d9-3eb176e96307 Mon, 28 Aug 2023 08:28:45 -0400 Study shows benefit of traditional Chinese medicine for heart failure
研究将妊娠期高血压疾病与痴呆联系起来妊娠期高血压疾病（HDP）——包括慢性/妊娠期高血压和先兆子痫在内的高血压疾病——与晚年的心脏病密切相关，但在此之前，很少有研究将这些疾病与认知联系起来。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Research-links-hypertential-disorders-of-pregnancy-with-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Research-links-hypertential-disorders-of-pregnancy-with-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aa7b69bf-8cf5-450d-a0ed-c06d84979ff2 Mon, 28 Aug 2023 08:01:48 -0400 Research links hypertensive disorders of pregnancy with dementia
超越健康记录：深度学习通过基于图像的表型分析增强疾病诊断研究人员探索了基于双能 X 射线吸收测定法 (DXA) 扫描的基于图像的表型分析的使用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Beyond-health-records-Deep-learning-enhances-disease-diagnosis-via-image-based-phenotyping.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230828/Beyond-health-records-Deep-learning-enhances-disease-diagnosis-via-image-based-phenotyping.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a63361f1-dfa6-4998-a0d2-c258776b83f6 Mon, 28 Aug 2023 07:56:00 -0400 Beyond health records: Deep learning enhances disease diagnosis via image-based phenotyping
